CREATE TABLE #TEMPThread( ThreadId int NOT NULL, SortNo int NOT NULL )
INSERT INTO #TEMPThread SELECT ThreadId, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY createDate DESC) FROM Thread WHERE isOrigin = 1 and isDeleted = 0
SELECT Thread.ThreadId ,isOrigin ,BBSUser.UserId ,BBSUser.UserName ,Thread.CreateDate ,Thread.UpdateDate ,OriginThreadId ,Title ,PostText FROM #TEMPThread INNER JOIN Thread ON #TEMPThread.ThreadId = Thread.ThreadId OR #TEMPThread.ThreadId = Thread.OriginThreadId INNER JOIN BBSUser ON Thread.UserId = BBSUser.UserId WHERE isDeleted = 0 AND SortNo > @ThreadFrom AND SortNo <= @ThreadTo ORDER BY sortNo, isOrigin DESC, Thread.CreateDate DESC

Upsert.Statement: UPDATE Thread SET Title = CASE WHEN @IsDeleted = 1 THEN Title ELSE @Title END , PostText = CASE WHEN @IsDeleted = 1 THEN PostText ELSE @PostText END, UpdateDate = GetDate(), IsDeleted = @IsDeleted WHERE ThreadId = @ThreadId IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 INSERT INTO Thread ( isOrigin, UserId, CreateDate, Title, PostText, IsDeleted, OriginThreadId ) VALUES ( CASE WHEN @OriginThreadId > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, @UserId, GetDate(), @Title, @PostText, 0, --False @OriginThreadId )
